item.title: Here’s Why Beijing Is Concerned About Losing the Islamic Republic Regime

item.title: Minnesota fraud whistleblower says 'lack of guardrails was pretty shocking'
item.description: Minnesota DHS whistleblower Faye Bernstein claims the department ignored her warnings amid investigation into the alleged $9 billion fraud scheme.

item.title: Federal judge rules ICE in Iowa illegally detained man, tried to 'cover its tracks'
item.description: Federal judge ruled ICE illegally detained Iowa man, accused agency of trying to "cover its tracks" after violating immigration detention procedures.

item.title: Redistricting fight erupts as Maryland Democrats move to redraw lone GOP House seat
item.description: Maryland's only GOP Congressman Andy Harris threatens legal action over Democratic redistricting plans that could potentially eliminate his seat.
